titleStmt.title: Three tractates by Jos. Hall, D.D. and B.N.
Selections. 1646
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, for Nat. Butter,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: "The peace-maker" with individual title page and paging, [20], 242 p. at end is lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
The devout soule -- The free prisoner, or, The comfort of restraint -- The remedy of discontentment, or, A treatise of contentation in whatsoever condition -- The peace-maker.
